testcase.classname: As a Job seeker, I want to apply job in Homage career portal
testcase.name: Submit an application and validate all the required fields (Positive Test case)
testcase.system-out: Given I launch application url and verify the UI............................passed When I enter the Basic details..............................................passed And enter the Roles selection...............................................passed And enter the Job Opportunities.............................................passed And enter the Engagement Types and others...................................passed And enable the declaration form.............................................passed And Submit application......................................................passed Then I verify marked mandatory fields are Not observed......................passed And Application submitted successfully......................................passed

testcase.classname: As a Job seeker, I want to apply job in Homage career portal
testcase.name: Submit an application with Invalid data (Negative Test case)
testcase.system-out: Given I launch application url and verify the UI............................passed When I Missing some basic details...........................................passed And Submit application......................................................passed Then I verify marked mandatory fields are Exists............................passed And Application submitted Failed............................................passed
